Shame on Feinstein Announcement and Press Conference Gallery

On December 15, on the Bill of Rights Day, there was a press conference announcing the Shame on Feinstein Coalition which wrote a letter to Senator Feinstein expressing their anger about her approach to the NSA issue at National Lawyers Guild San Francisco Bay Area Chapter, San Francisco, California. Sign the Letter.
